long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension allows you to modify request headers of http requests. You can add multiple request headers and manage them in profiles. 
You can also add as many profiles as you like with as many request headersas you like. 
It is also possible to add url filters to restrict the application of the request headers to matching urls.

You can import profiles from json files and export profiles to share them with others.
